# operationCancelled

**Type Property**

An error indicating the user canceled the operation.

## Declaration

```swift
static var operationCancelled: HMError.Code { get }
```

## Detecting operation errors

- **operationInProgress**: An error indicating the operation is already in progress.
- **operationTimedOut**: An error indicating the operation timed out.

items.description: An error indicating the operation is already in progress.
